About Ready2Eat

Ready2Eat is an leading Irish online food delivery marketplace, with over 3,500 restaurants and convenience partners available online in Ireland. Ready2Eat offers a choice of over 40 cuisines across breakfast, lunch and dinner on the platform making Ireland's #1 food delivery brand.

Headquartered in Waterford, the Company is focused on connecting consumers and partners through its platforms. With thousands connected partners, Ready2Eat offers consumers a wide variety of food choices. Come to find us here!
